channel.title: How do i make a command?
channel.description:
how would i make a command, for example to do the following
type ::money for 10M type ::christmas for a santa hat Make the ::pickup command useable - on cheezscape i cant use it - regardless of my player rights
When i do something to the client.java, save, compile and then run the server, nothing seems to of happened.

item.title: How do i make a command?
item.dc:creator: @Wreckaz Wreckaz
item.description:
@Wreckaz wrote:

put it where all ur other commands r

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a command?

item.title: How do i make a command?
item.dc:creator: @jason2gs jason2gs
item.description:
@jason2gs wrote:

Try it. If it doesn’t work, put it somewhere else

I was actually wondering this myself. I’m glad someone posted a code!

Try searching the client.java for the other commands that Cheezscape has.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a command?
item.dc:creator: @chewy22 chewy22
item.description:
@chewy22 wrote:

Heres for 10m…

else if (command.startsWith("money for 10m") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(995,10000000); sendMessage("YOURMESSAGEHERE"); }
